Title: Directs the commissioner of health to conduct a study relating to the number of emergency room beds
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health to conduct a study relating to the number of emergency room beds in the state and to make recommendations on the minimum number of emergency rooms required per capita and the maximum distance patients shall be expected to travel to access emergency room services.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to requiring the commissioner of health to conduct a study relating to the number of emergency room beds
